name: BrootForce
description:
In this online multiplayer game, compete with enemies to capture the purple decryptable targets

Controls:

  • WASD - to move
  • Mouse - to aim
  • Left Click - Root Attack
  • Right Click - Decrypt target

Credits:

  • Developer - Hibnu Hishath
  • Character Assets by Quaternios
  • Special thanks to Coherence Team
  • Special thanks to Christian Wookey
  • Special thanks to West Foulks

The project is open source and for anyone who wants to read through my terrible codebase here's the repo: https://github.com/sliptrixx/GGJ2023
